passage: On 22 May 2015, Sun reporter Anthony France was found guilty of aiding and abetting misconduct in a public office between 2008 and 2011. France’s trial followed the London Metropolitan Police's Operation Elveden, an ongoing investigation into alleged payments to police and officials in exchange for information. He had paid a total of more than £22,000 to PC Timothy Edwards, an anti-terrorism police officer based at Heathrow Airport. The police officer had already pleaded guilty to misconduct in a public office and given a two-year gaol sentence in 2014, but the jury in France’s trial was not informed of this. Following the passing of the guilty verdict, the officer leading Operation Elveden, Detective Chief Superintendent Gordon Briggs said France and Edwards had been in a "long-term, corrupt relationship".
question: Who is the reporting company that Anthony France was a reporter for?
translated_passage: ብዕለት 22 ግንቦት 2015 ሳንቶኒ ፈረንሳ ኣብ መንጎ 2008ን 2011ን ኣብ ህዝባዊ ቤት ጽሕፈት ንዝተፈጸመ ጌጋ ተግባር ብምሕጋዝን ብምትሕብባርን ገበነኛ ኮይኑ ተረኺቡ።ፍርዲ ፈረንሳ ንፖሊስ ለንደን ኤልቨደን ዝገበሮ ፍርዲ ተኸቲሉ፡ ነቲ ኣብ ልዕሊ ፖሊስን ሰበስልጣንን ዝግበር ዝነበረ ክፍሊት ዝምልከት ቀጻሊ መርመራ ንፖሊስን ሰበስልጣንን እዩ። ኣብ መዓርፎ ነፈርቲ ሄትሮው ዝመደበሩ ጸረ-ሽበራ ፖሊስ ዝኾነ ፒሲ ቲሞቲ ኤድዋርድስ ብድምር ልዕሊ 22 ሽሕ ፓውንድ ከፊሉ ነይሩ። እቲ ፖሊስ ድሮ ኣብ ሓደ ህዝባዊ ቤት ጽሕፈት ብዘይግቡእ ተግባር ገበነኛ ምዃኑ ተኣሚኑ ኣብ 2014 ንኽልተ ዓመት ናይ ጋኦል ፍርዲ ተዋሂብዎ እኳ እንተነበረ፡ ኣብ ፍርዲ ፈረንሳ ዝነበረ ዳያኑ ግን ብዛዕባ’ዚ ኣይተሓበረን። ድሕሪ ምሕላፍ ናይቲ ገበነኛ ፍርዲ፡ እቲ መኮነን ንስርሒት ኤልቨደን ዝመርሕ ዝነበረ ሓላፊ፡ መርማሪ ዋና ተቖጻጻሪ ጎርደን ብሪግስ፡ ፈረንሳን ኤድዋርድስን ኣብ "ነዊሕ ግዜ ዝጸንሕን ብልሹው ዝምድና" ከምዝነበረን ገሊጹ።

passage: Other major television series Spielberg produced were Band of Brothers, Taken and The Pacific. He was an executive producer on the critically acclaimed 2005 TV miniseries Into the West which won two Emmy awards, including one for Geoff Zanelli's score. For his 2010 miniseries The Pacific he teamed up once again with co-producer Tom Hanks, with Gary Goetzman also co-producing'. translated_question: ንስፒልበርግ ናይ መን ኢሚ ኤሚ ተዓዊቱ?

passage: The largest expansion of comprehensive schools in 1965 resulted from a policy decision taken in 1965 by Anthony Crosland, Secretary of State for Education in the 1964–1970 Labour government. The policy decision was implemented by Circular 10/65, an instruction to local education authorities to plan for conversion. Students sat the 11+ examination in their last year of primary education and were sent to one of a secondary modern, secondary technical or grammar school depending on their perceived ability. Secondary technical schools were never widely implemented and for 20 years there was a virtual bipartite system which saw fierce competition for the available grammar school places, which varied between 15% and 25% of total secondary places, depending on location.[citation needed]
question: How long had students been in primary school?
translated_passage: እቲ ዝዓበየ ምስፍሕፋሕ ኩለመዳያዊ ኣብያተ ትምህርቲ ኣብ 1965 ብሰንኪ ኣብ 1965 ብኣንቶኒ ክሮስላንድ፡ ጸሓፊ ጉዳያት ወጻኢ ትምህርቲ ኣብ 1964–1970 መንግስቲ ዕዮ ዝተወስደ ውሳነ ፖሊሲ እዩ። እቲ ናይ ፖሊሲ ውሳነ ብሰርኩላር 10/65 ዝተተግበረ ኮይኑ፡ ንለውጢ ንምውጣን ንሰብመዚ ትምህርቲ ከባቢ ዝምልከት መምርሒ እዩ። ተማሃሮ ኣብ ናይ መወዳእታ ዓመት ናይ መባእታ ትምህርቶም 11+ ፈተና ኮፍ ኣቢሎም ናብ ሓደ ካብ ካልኣዊ ዘመናዊ፣ ካልኣዊ ቴክኒካዊ ወይ ሰዋስው ቤት ትምህርቲ ከከም ዝግመት ዓቕሞም ተላኢኾም። ካልኣዊ ቴክኒካውያን ኣብያተ ትምህርቲ ብሰፊሑ ተተግቢሮም ኣይፈልጡን ን20 ዓመታት ድማ ንዘለዉ ናይ ሰዋስው ኣብያተ ትምህርቲ ቦታታት ብርቱዕ ውድድር ዝረኣየ ቨርቹዋል ክልተኣዊ ስርዓት ነይሩ፣ እዚ ድማ ከከም ኣቀማምጣኡ ኣብ መንጎ 15%ን 25%ን ካብ ጠቕላላ ካልኣዊ ቦታታት ዝተፈላለየ ነበረ።

passage: While asthma is a well recognized condition, there is not one universal agreed upon definition. It is defined by the Global Initiative for Asthma as "a chronic inflammatory disorder of the airways in which many cells and cellular elements play a role. The chronic inflammation is associated with airway hyper-responsiveness that leads to recurrent episodes of wheezing, breathlessness, chest tightness and coughing particularly at night or in the early morning. These episodes are usually associated with widespread but variable airflow obstruction within the lung that is often reversible either spontaneously or with treatment".
question: What group defines asthma as "a chronic inflammatory disorder of the airways?
translated_passage: ኣዝማ ጽቡቕ ኣፍልጦ ዘለዎ ኩነታት እኳ እንተኾነ፡ ኣብ ትርጉም ዝተሰማምዓሉ ሓደ ኣድማሳዊ ግን የለን። ብዓለማዊ ተበግሶ ኣዝማ "ብዙሓት ዋህዮታትን ዋህዮኣዊ ባእታታትን ተራ ዝጻወቱሉ መስመራት ኣየር ሕዱር ነድሪ ጸገም፡ እቲ ሕዱር ነድሪ ምስ ልዕሊ ዓቐን ምላሽ መስመር ኣየር ዝተኣሳሰር ኮይኑ፡ ናብ ተደጋጋሚ ክፋላት ምሕንፋጽ፡ ምጭባጥ ኣፍልቢ፡ ብፍላይ ድማ ኣብ ውሽጢ ንግሆ ዝፍስሓሉ እዋን ምስ ዝፍጽሞ፡ ኣብ ምሉእ እቲ ዝፍስሓሉ እዋን ምስኡ ዝፍኖ ስቕታ ዝፈጥር፡ ምስ ተደጋጋሚ ክፋል ናይ ምሕንካስ ዘስዕብ፡ ምስ ተደጋጋሚ ክፋላት ዝመርሕ እዩ። ንድሕሪት ዝምለሱ ወይ ብባዕሎም ወይ ብሕክምና"።

passage: In 1981, The Times and The Sunday Times were bought from Thomson by Rupert Murdoch's News International. The acquisition followed three weeks of intensive bargaining with the unions by company negotiators, John Collier and Bill O'Neill.
question: How long did it take for the Times and The Sunday Times to be bought from Thomson?
translated_passage: ኣብ 1981 ዘ ታይምስን ዘ ሰንደይ ታይምስን ካብ ቶምሰን ብሩፐርት ሙርዶክ ኒውስ ኢንተርናሽናል ተዓዲጉ። እዚ ምግዛእ ንሰለስተ ሰሙን ምስ ማሕበራት ማሕበራት ብኩባንያ ዝደርበየሉ ዝነበረ ጽዑቕ ድርድር ድሕሪ ምጽናሕ፡ ጆን ኮሊየርን ቢል ኦኒልን እዩ።

translated_question: ካብ ቶምሰን ክሳብ ክንደይ ግዜ ወሲዱሉ ንዘ ታይምስን ናይ ሰንበት ታይምስን?

passage: In his 1884 article William James argued that feelings and emotions were secondary to physiological phenomena. In his theory, James proposed that the perception of what he called an "exciting fact" directly led to a physiological response, known as "emotion." To account for different types of emotional experiences, James proposed that stimuli trigger activity in the autonomic nervous system, which in turn produces an emotional experience in the brain. The Danish psychologist Carl Lange also proposed a similar theory at around the same time, and therefore this theory became known as the James–Lange theory. As James wrote, "the perception of bodily changes, as they occur, is the emotion." James further claims that "we feel sad because we cry, angry because we strike, afraid because we tremble, and neither we cry, strike, nor tremble because we are sorry, angry, or fearful, as the case may be."
question: When did William James publish his theory on emotions?
translated_passage: ኣብቲ ብ1884 ዝጸሓፎ ጽሑፍ ዊልያም ጀምስ፡ ስምዒታትን ስምዒታትን ካልኣዊ ከም ፊዚዮሎጂካዊ ተርእዮታት ከም ዝነበረ ተማጒቱ። ያእቆብ ኣብ ክልሰ-ሓሳቡ፡ እቲ "ዘሐጉስ ሓቂ" ዝበሎ ኣረኣእያ፡ ብቐጥታ ናብ ስነ-ኣካላዊ ምላሽ ከም ዘምጽአ፡ "ስምዒት" ተባሂሉ ዝፍለጥ ከም ዝመርሖ ሓሳብ ኣቕሪቡ። ንዝተፈላለዩ ዓይነታት ስምዒታዊ ተመኩሮታት ንምሕሳብ፡ ጀምስ ኣብቲ ኣውቶኖሚክ ስርዓተ ነርቭ ንጥፈታት ምቕንጣጥ ከም ዘበግስ ሓሳብ ኣቕሪቡ፡ እዚ ድማ ብግዲኡ ኣብ ሓንጎል ስምዒታዊ ተመክሮ ከም ዘፍሪ። እቲ ናይ ዴንማርክ ስነ-ኣእምሮኣዊ ምሁር ካርል ላንገ እውን ኣብ ከባቢ ሓደ እዋን ተመሳሳሊ ክልሰ ሓሳብ ሓሳብ ኣቕረበ፣ ስለዚ እዚ ክልሰ-ሓሳብ እዚ ክልሰ-ሓሳብ ጀምስ–ላንጅ ተባሂሉ ተሰልጠ። ከምቲ ያእቆብ ዝጸሓፎ "ኣረኣእያ ኣካላዊ ለውጢ ከምቲ ዝፍጸም፡ እቲ ስምዒት እዩ"። ያእቆብ ብተወሳኺ "ንብዓት ስለ ዝነበርና፡ ስለ ዝፈርሕና፡ ስለ ዝፈርሕና፡ ከም እንበኽየና፡ ከም ዘይንቕንቕ፡ ከምቲ ከምኡ ዝኣመሰለ ነገር ስለ ዝንቀሳቐስ፡ ስለ ዘይንቕንቕ፡ ክንበኪ፡ ወይ ንቕልጥፍ ስለ ዘይንቕልቀቕ፡ ሓዚንና ኢና ዝስምዓና" ይብል።
translated_question: ዊልያም ጀምስ ኣብ ስምዒታት ክልሰ-ሓሳቡ መዓስ እዩ ኣሕቲሙ?

passage: Besides parents, Liu Shaokun (刘绍坤), a Sichuan school teacher, was detained on June 25, 2008 for "disseminating rumors and destroying social order" about the Sichuan earthquake. Liu’s family was later told that he was being investigated on suspicion of the crime of inciting subversion. Liu had travelled to the Shifang, taken photos of collapsed school buildings, and put them online. He had also expressed his anger at “the shoddy tofu-dregs buildings” (豆腐渣工程) in a media interview. He was ordered to serve one year of re-education through labor (RTL). According to the organization Human Rights in China, Liu has been released to serve his RTL sentence outside of the labor camp.
question: When was Liu Shaokun arrested?
translated_passage: ብዘይካ ወለዲ ሊዩ ሻውኩን (刘绍坤) መምህር ቤት ትምህርቲ ሲቹዋን፡ ብዛዕባ ምንቅጥቃጥ ምድሪ ሲቹዋን "መዝገብ ወረታት ብምፍታሕን ማሕበራዊ ስርዓት ብምጥፋእን" ብ25 ሰነ 2008 ተኣሲሩ። ስድራቤት ሊዩ ድሒሮም፡ ነቲ ኣብ ምንቅጥቃጥ ዝድርኽ ገበን ብምጥንቃቕ ይምርመር ከምዘሎ ተነጊርዎም። ሊዩ ናብ ሺፋንግ ተጓዒዙ፡ ነቲ ዝፈረሰ ህንጻታት ቤት ትምህርቲ ስእሊ ወሲዱ ኣብ መስመር ኣእትዩ ነበረ። ኣብ ናይ ሚድያ ቃለ መሕትት “The Shoddy Tofu-Dregs Buildings” (豆腐渣工程) እውን ቁጥዑ ገሊጹ ነይሩ። ብጉልበት (RTL) ኣቢሉ ንሓደ ዓመት ዳግማይ ትምህርቲ ከገልግል ተኣዚዙ። ብመሰረት እቲ ኣብ ቻይና ዘሎ ትካል ሰብኣዊ መሰላት፡ ሊዩ ካብቲ ናይ ዕዮ መዓስከር ወጻኢ ን RTL ፍርዱ ከገልግል ተፈቲሑ።
translated_question: ሊዩ ሸኩን መዓስ እዩ ተኣሲሩ?

translated_question: ሊዩ ሸኩን መዓስ እዩ ተኣሲሩ?

passage: Cotton is used to make a number of textile products. These include terrycloth for highly absorbent bath towels and robes; denim for blue jeans; cambric, popularly used in the manufacture of blue work shirts (from which we get the term "blue-collar"); and corduroy, seersucker, and cotton twill. Socks, underwear, and most T-shirts are made from cotton. Bed sheets often are made from cotton. Cotton also is used to make yarn used in crochet and knitting. Fabric also can be made from recycled or recovered cotton that otherwise would be thrown away during the spinning, weaving, or cutting process. While many fabrics are made completely of cotton, some materials blend cotton with other fibers, including rayon and synthetic fibers such as polyester. It can either be used in knitted or woven fabrics, as it can be blended with elastine to make a stretchier thread for knitted fabrics, and apparel such as stretch jeans.
question: What material is used in many textile products?
translated_passage: ጡጥ ብርክት ዝበሉ ፍርያት ዓለባ ንምስራሕ ይጥቀመሉ። እዚኦም ድማ ቴሪክሎት ንኣዝዩ ኣብ ምምጣጥ ዝኣቱ መንጸፍን ልብስን፤ ዲኒም ንሰማያዊ ጂንስ፤ ካምብሪክ፡ ኣብ ምፍራይ ሰማያዊ ናይ ስራሕ ማልያታት ብህዝቢ ዝጥቀመሉ (ካብኡ "ሰማያዊ-ኮላር" ዝብል ቃል ንረክብ)፤ ከምኡ’ውን ኮርዱሮይ፡ ሴርሳከርን ጡጥ ትዊልን። ካልሲ፡ ውሽጣዊ ክዳን፡ መብዛሕትኡ ቲሸርት ድማ ካብ ጡጥ ዝተሰርሐ እዩ። መብዛሕትኡ ግዜ ናይ ዓራት ኣንሶላ ካብ ጡጥ እዩ ዝስራሕ። ጡጥ ኣብ ክሮቸትን ስፌትን ፈትሊ ንኽጥቀም እውን ይጥቀመሉ። ጨርቂ እውን ካብ ዳግማይ ዝተጠቕመሉ ወይ ዝተሓወሰ ጡጥ ክስራሕ ይኽእል እዩ እዚ እንተዘይኮይኑ ኣብ እዋን ምፍንጃር፣ ስፌት ወይ መስርሕ ምቑራጽ ዝድርበ። ብዙሓት ጨርቅታት ምሉእ ብምሉእ ካብ ጡጥ ክስራሕ እንከሎ፡ ገለ ንዋት ግን ጡጥ ምስ ካልኦት ጽሕግታት ይወሃሃዱ፡ ንሳቶም ድማ ራዮንን ከም ፖሊስተር ዝኣመሰሉ ስነ-ጥበባዊ ፋይበርን ይርከብዎም። ወይ ኣብ ዝተጠምጠመ ወይ ዝተሰፍየ ጨርቂ ክትጥቀመሉ ትኽእል ኢኻ፣ ምኽንያቱ ምስ ኤላስቲን ተሓዋዊሱ ንዝተጠምጠመ ጨርቅታት ዝዝርጋሕ ፈትሊ ንምስራሕ፣ ከምኡ’ውን ከም ስትሬች ጂንስ ዝኣመሰለ ኣልባሳት።
translated_question: ኣብ ብዙሓት ፍርያት ዓለባ እንታይ ዓይነት ንብረት እዩ ዝጥቀም?

passage: Cotton is used to make a number of textile products. These include terrycloth for highly absorbent bath towels and robes; denim for blue jeans; cambric, popularly used in the manufacture of blue work shirts (from which we get the term "blue-collar"); and corduroy, seersucker, and cotton twill. Socks, underwear, and most T-shirts are made from cotton. Bed sheets often are made from cotton. Cotton also is used to make yarn used in crochet and knitting. Fabric also can be made from recycled or recovered cotton that otherwise would be thrown away during the spinning, weaving, or cutting process. While many fabrics are made completely of cotton, some materials blend cotton with other fibers, including rayon and synthetic fibers such as polyester. It can either be used in knitted or woven fabrics, as it can be blended with elastine to make a stretchier thread for knitted fabrics, and apparel such as stretch jeans.
question: What material is used in many textile products?

translated_question: ኣብ ብዙሓት ፍርያት ዓለባ እንታይ ዓይነት ንብረት እዩ ዝጥቀም?

passage: Primary (or elementary) education consists of the first five to seven years of formal, structured education. In general, primary education consists of six to eight years of schooling starting at the age of five or six, although this varies between, and sometimes within, countries. Globally, around 89% of children aged six to twelve are enrolled in primary education, and this proportion is rising. Under the Education For All programs driven by UNESCO, most countries have committed to achieving universal enrollment in primary education by 2015, and in many countries, it is compulsory. The division between primary and secondary education is somewhat arbitrary, but it generally occurs at about eleven or twelve years of age. Some education systems have separate middle schools, with the transition to the final stage of secondary education taking place at around the age of fourteen. Schools that provide primary education, are mostly referred to as primary schools or elementary schools. Primary schools are often subdivided into infant schools and junior school.
question: What percentage of children are enrolled in primary education?
translated_passage: መባእታዊ (ወይ መባእታ) ትምህርቲ ካብ ቀዳሞት ሓሙሽተ ክሳብ ሸውዓተ ዓመት ወግዓዊ፣ ዝተዋደደ ትምህርቲ ዝሓዘ እዩ። ብሓፈሻ መባእታ ትምህርቲ ካብ ሓሙሽተ ክሳብ ሸሞንተ ዓመት ትምህርቲ ዝቖመ ኮይኑ ካብ ሓሙሽተ ወይ ሽዱሽተ ዓመት ዝዕድሚኡ፣ እዚ ኣብ መንጎ ሃገራት ዝፈላለ እኳ እንተኾነ፣ ሓደ ሓደ ግዜ ድማ ኣብ ውሽጢ ሃገራት ይፈላለ እዩ። ብደረጃ ዓለም ኣስታት 89% ካብ ሽዱሽተ ክሳብ ዓሰርተው ክልተ ህጻናት ዝዕድሚኦም ህጻናት ኣብ መባእታ ትምህርቲ ተመዝጊቦም ኣለዉ፡ እዚ ብዝሒ ድማ ይውስኽ ኣሎ። ኣብ ትሕቲ ትምህርቲ ንኹሉ ብዩኔስኮ ዝድረኽ ትምህርቲ፡ መብዛሕትአን ሃገራት ኣብ 2015 ኣብ መባእታ ትምህርቲ ኣድማሳዊ ምዝገባ ንምዕዋት ቃል ኣትየን ኣለዋ፡ ኣብ ብዙሓት ሃገራት ድማ ግዴታ እዩ። ኣብ መንጎ መባእታን ካልኣይን ትምህርቲ ዘሎ ምምቕቓል ብመጠኑ ፍቓደኛ እኳ እንተ ኾይኑ፡ ብሓፈሻ ግን ኣብ ኣስታት ዓሰርተ ሓደ ወይ ዓሰርተው ክልተ ዓመት ዝዕድሚኡ እዩ። ገለ ስርዓታት ትምህርቲ ዝተፈላለዩ ናይ ማእከላይ ደረጃ ኣብያተ ትምህርቲ ዘለዎም ኮይኖም፡ ናብ ናይ መወዳእታ ደረጃ ካልኣይ ደረጃ ትምህርቲ ምስግጋር ኣብ ከባቢ ዓሰርተ ኣርባዕተ ዓመት ዕድመ ይካየድ። መባእታ ትምህርቲ ዝህባ ኣብያተ ትምህርቲ፣ መብዛሕትኡ ግዜ መባእታ ኣብያተ ትምህርቲ ወይ መባእታ ኣብያተ ትምህርቲ ተባሂለን ይጽውዓ። መባእታ ኣብያተ ትምህርቲ መብዛሕትኡ ግዜ ናብ ኣብያተ ትምህርቲ ዕሸላትን ጁንየር ቤት ትምህርትን ይኽፈል።
translated_question: ኣብ መባእታ ትምህርቲ ክንደይ ሚእታዊት ካብ ህጻናት ይምዝገቡ?

translated_passage: መባእታዊ (ወይ መባእታ) ትምህርቲ ካብ ቀዳሞት ሓሙሽተ ክሳብ ሸውዓተ ዓመት ወግዓዊ፣ ዝተዋደደ ትምህርቲ ዝሓዘ እዩ። ብሓፈሻ መባእታ ትምህርቲ ካብ ሓሙሽተ ክሳብ ሸሞንተ ዓመት ትምህርቲ ዝቖመ ኮይኑ ካብ ሓሙሽተ ወይ ሽዱሽተ ዓመት ዝዕድሚኡ፣ እዚ ኣብ መንጎ ሃገራት ዝፈላለ እኳ እንተኾነ፣ ሓደ ሓደ ግዜ ድማ ኣብ ውሽጢ ሃገራት ይፈላለ እዩ። ብደረጃ ዓለም ኣስታት 89% ካብ ሽዱሽተ ክሳብ ዓሰርተው ክልተ ህጻናት ዝዕድሚኦም ህጻናት ኣብ መባእታ ትምህርቲ ተመዝጊቦም ኣለዉ፡ እዚ ብዝሒ ድማ ይውስኽ ኣሎ። ኣብ ትሕቲ ትምህርቲ ንኹሉ ብዩኔስኮ ዝድረኽ ትምህርቲ፡ መብዛሕትአን ሃገራት ኣብ 2015 ኣብ መባእታ ትምህርቲ ኣድማሳዊ ምዝገባ ንምዕዋት ቃል ኣትየን ኣለዋ፡ ኣብ ብዙሓት ሃገራት ድማ ግዴታ እዩ። ኣብ መንጎ መባእታን ካልኣይን ትምህርቲ ዘሎ ምምቕቓል ብመጠኑ ፍቓደኛ እኳ እንተ ኾይኑ፡ ብሓፈሻ ግን ኣብ ኣስታት ዓሰርተ ሓደ ወይ ዓሰርተው ክልተ ዓመት ዝዕድሚኡ እዩ። ገለ ስርዓታት ትምህርቲ ዝተፈላለዩ ናይ ማእከላይ ደረጃ ኣብያተ ትምህርቲ ዘለዎም ኮይኖም፡ ናብ ናይ መወዳእታ ደረጃ ካልኣይ ደረጃ ትምህርቲ ምስግጋር ኣብ ከባቢ ዓሰርተ ኣርባዕተ ዓመት ዕድመ ይካየድ። መባእታ ትምህርቲ ዝህባ ኣብያተ ትምህርቲ፣ መብዛሕትኡ ግዜ መባእታ ኣብያተ ትምህርቲ ወይ መባእታ ኣብያተ ትምህርቲ ተባሂለን ይጽውዓ። መባእታ ኣብያተ ትምህርቲ መብዛሕትኡ ግዜ ናብ ኣብያተ ትምህርቲ ዕሸላትን ጁንየር ቤት ትምህርትን ይኽፈል።
translated_question: ኣብ መባእታ ትምህርቲ ክንደይ ሚእታዊት ካብ ህጻናት ይምዝገቡ?

passage: In 1899, a Doncaster member of the Amalgamated Society of Railway Servants, Thomas R. Steels, proposed in his union branch that the Trade Union Congress call a special conference to bring together all left-wing organisations and form them into a single body that would sponsor Parliamentary candidates. The motion was passed at all stages by the TUC, and the proposed conference was held at the Memorial Hall on Farringdon Street on 26 and 27 February 1900. The meeting was attended by a broad spectrum of working-class and left-wing organisations — trades unions represented about one third of the membership of the TUC delegates.
question: What year did Thomas R. Steels propose that a trade union congress be held to present a single body?
translated_passage: ኣብ 1899 ሓደ ዶንካስተር ኣባል ናይቲ ዝተሓዋወሰ ማሕበር ኣገልገልቲ ባቡር ቶማስ ኣር ስቲልስ ኣብ ጨንፈር ማሕበራቱ፡ ኮንግረስ ማሕበር ሰራሕተኛታት ንኹለን ጸጋማውያን ውድባት ኣብ ሓደ ንምምጻእን ሕጹያት ባይቶ ዝምውል ሓደ ኣካል ንምቛምን ፍሉይ ዋዕላ ክጽውዕ ሓሳብ ኣቕረበ። እቲ ምሕጽንታ ኣብ ኩሉ መድረኻት ብTUC ሓሊፉ፣ እቲ ዝቐረበ ዋዕላ ድማ ኣብ መዘከርታ ኣዳራሽ ኣብ ጎደና ፋሪንግዶን ብዕለት 26ን 27ን ለካቲት 1900 ተኻይዱ።እቲ ኣኼባ ብሰፊሕ ስፔክትረም ናይ ሰራሕተኛታትን ጸጋማውያን ትካላትን ተሳቲፉ — ናይ ሰራሕተኛታት ማሕበራት ኣስታት ሓደ ሲሶ ኣባልነት ልኡኻት TUC ዝውክሉ እዮም።
translated_question: ቶማስ ኣር ስቲልስ ሓደ ኣካል ንምቕራብ ናይ ሰራሕተኛታት ማሕበር ኮንግረስ ክካየድ ሓሳብ ኣቕሪቡ?

Steels, proposed in his union branch that the Trade Union Congress call a special conference to bring together all left-wing organisations and form them into a single body that would sponsor Parliamentary candidates. The motion was passed at all stages by the TUC, and the proposed conference was held at the Memorial Hall on Farringdon Street on 26 and 27 February 1900. passage: The city slopes gently from the northwest to southeast on a till plain composed largely of glacial and lake clay. The most notable topographical feature in the city is the Detroit Moraine, a broad clay ridge on which the older portions of Detroit and Windsor sit atop, rising approximately 62 feet (19 m) above the river at its highest point. The highest elevation in the city is located directly north of Gorham Playground on the northwest side approximately three blocks south of 8 Mile Road, at a height of 675 to 680 feet (206 to 207 m). Detroit's lowest elevation is along the Detroit River, at a surface height of 572 feet (174 m).
question: What is the most notable topographical feature in Detroit?
translated_passage: እታ ከተማ ካብ ሰሜናዊ ምዕራብ ናብ ደቡባዊ ምብራቕ ቀስ ኢሉ ኣብ ልዕሊ እቲ ብዓቢኡ ብበረድን ቀላይን ዝተሰርሐ ጭቃ ዝተዋህለለ ቲል ፕሌይስ ቀስ ኢሉ ይቖርጽ። ኣብታ ከተማ እቲ ኣዝዩ ፍሉጥ ዝኾነ ቶፖግራፊካዊ መልክዕ፡ ዲትሮይት ሞረይን ኮይኑ፡ እቶም ዝኣረጉ ክፋላት ዲትሮይትን ዊንድሶርን ኣብ ልዕሊ እቲ ዝለዓለ ነጥቡ ኣስታት 62 ጫማ (19 ሜተር) ልዕሊ እቲ ሩባ ዝለዓል ዝነበረ ሰፊሕ ርእሲ ጭቃ ኮይኑ፡ ኣብቲ ዝለዓለ ነጥቡ ኣስታት 62 ጫማ (19 ሜተር) ዝዓቢ እዩ። እቲ ዝለዓለ ቁመት ኣብታ ከተማ ብቐጥታ ብሰሜን ካብ ጎርሃም ፕለይግራውንድ ብሰሜናዊ ምዕራብ ሸነኽ ኣስታት ሰለስተ ብሎኮታት ንደቡብ ካብ 8 ማይል መንገዲ ኣስታት ሰለስተ ብሎኮታት ርሒቑ ዝርከብ ኮይኑ፡ ቁመት ካብ 675 ክሳብ 680 ጫማ (206 ክሳብ 207 ሜትር) ቁመት ኣለዎ። ዲትሮይት ዝወሓደ ቁመት ኣብ ጎኒ ሩባ ዲትሮይት ዝርከብ ኮይኑ፡ ኣብ 572 ጫማ ቁመት ዘለዎ ገጽ (174 ሜተር) እዩ።
translated_question: ኣብ ዲትሮይት እቲ ዝያዳ ርኡይ ዝኾነ ቶፖግራፊካዊ ባህሪ እንታይ እዩ?

passage: Zakaria Mohieddin, who was Nasser's vice president, said that Nasser gradually changed during his reign. He ceased consulting his colleagues and made more and more of the decisions himself. Although Nasser repeatedly said that a war with Israel will start at a time of his, or Arab, choosing, on 1967 he started a bluffing game "but a successful bluff means your opponent must not know which cards you are holding. In this case Nasser's opponent could see his hand in the mirror and knew he was only holding a pair of deuces" and Nasser knew that his army is not prepared yet. "All of this was out of character...His tendencies in this regard may have been accentuated by diabetes... That was the only rational explanation for his actions in 1967".
question: Who was Nasser's vice president?
translated_passage: ምክትል ፕረዚደንት ናስር ዝነበረ ዛካርያ ሞሂዲን፡ ናስር ኣብ ዘመነ ንግስነቱ በብቑሩብ ከም ዝተቐየረ ገሊጻ። ንመሳርሕቱ ምምኽኻር ኣቋሪጹ፡ ባዕሉ እቲ ውሳነታት ዝያዳ ወሲዱ። ናስር ምስ እስራኤል ኲናት ኣብ ሓደ እዋን ዝጅምር ካብ ሓደ እዋን ዝጅምር፡ ወይ ዓረብ፡ ኣብ 1967 ዝመርጽሉ እዋን እኳ እንተበለ፡ ብ1967፡ ኣብ 1967 ዝመርጾ ዝነበረ፡ "ግን ዕዉት ብሉፍ ማለት ተጻባኢኻ ኣየኖት ካርድታት ከም ዝሓዛ ክፈልጥ የብሉን ማለት'ዩ። ኣብዚ ጉዳይ እዚ ተጻዋታይ ናስር ኣብ መስትያት ኢዱ ክርኢ ከም ዝኽእልን ናሰር ድማ ሰራዊቱ ዛጊት ከምዘይተዳለወ ፈሊጡ ከም ዝፈለጠን'ዩ ዝፈልጥ ነይሩ። "እዚ ኩሉ ካብ ባህሪ ወጻኢ እዩ ነይሩ...ኣብዚ መዳይ ዝነበሮ ዝንባለ ብሕማም ሽኮር ተጎልቢቡ ክኸውን ይኽእል እዩ... ንሱ እዩ ነይሩ እቲ እንኮ ርትዓዊ መግለጺ ንተግባራቱ ኣብ 1967።"
translated_question: ምክትል ፕረዚደንት ናስር መን እዩ ነይሩ?

passage: Uranium is a chemical element with symbol U and atomic number 92. It is a silvery-white metal in the actinide series of the periodic table. A uranium atom has 92 protons and 92 electrons, of which 6 are valence electrons. Uranium is weakly radioactive because all its isotopes are unstable (with half-lives of the six naturally known isotopes, uranium-233 to uranium-238, varying between 69 years and 4.5 billion years). The most common isotopes of uranium are uranium-238 (which has 146 neutrons and accounts for almost 99.3% of the uranium found in nature) and uranium-235 (which has 143 neutrons, accounting for 0.7% of the element found naturally). Uranium has the second highest atomic weight of the primordially occurring elements, lighter only than plutonium. Its density is about 70% higher than that of lead, but slightly lower than that of gold or tungsten. It occurs naturally in low concentrations of a few parts per million in soil, rock and water, and is commercially extracted from uranium-bearing minerals such as uraninite.
question: What is a chemical element with symbol U and atomic number 92?
translated_passage: ዩራንየም ምልክት Uን ኣቶሚክ ቁጽሪ 92ን ዘለዎ ኬሚካላዊ ባእታ እዩ።ኣብ ተኸታታሊ ናይ ፐርዮዲክ ሰሌዳ ኣክቲናይድ ብሩርን ጻዕዳን ብረት እዩ። ኣቶም ዩራንየም 92 ፕሮቶንን 92 ኤሌክትሮናትን ዘለዎ ኮይኑ ካብዚኦም እቶም 6 ቫለንስ ኤሌክትሮናት እዮም። ዩራንየም ድኹም ራድዮኣክቲቭ እዩ ምኽንያቱ ኩሎም ኣይሶቶፕታቱ ዘይርጉኣት ስለ ዝኾኑ (ፍቑራት ካብቶም ሽዱሽተ ብተፈጥሮ ዝፍለጡ ኣይሶቶፕስ፣ ዩራንየም-233 ክሳብ ዩራንየም-238፣ ኣብ መንጎ 69 ዓመትን 4.5 ቢልዮንን ዓመት ዝፈላለ)። እቶም ዝበዝሑ ልሙዳት ኣይሶቶፕስ ናይ ዩራንየም ዩራንየም-238 (እዚ 146 ኒውትሮን ዘለዎን ዳርጋ 99.3% ካብቲ ኣብ ተፈጥሮ ዝርከብ ዩራንየም)ን ዩራንየም-235ን (143 ኒውትሮን ዘለዎ ኮይኑ 0.7% ናይቲ ብተፈጥሮ ዝተረኽበ ባእታ ዝሕዝ) እዮም። ዩራንየም ካልኣይ ዝለዓለ ኣቶሚክ ክብደት ናይቶም ብመበቆላውያን ዝረኣዩ ባእታታት ዘለዎ ኮይኑ፡ ካብ ፕሉቶንየም ጥራይ ዝቐለለ እዩ። ጽቕጥቕጡ ካብቲ ናይ መሪሕነት ብኣስታት 70% ዝዛይድ ኮይኑ፡ ካብቲ ናይ ወርቂ ወይ ታንግስተን ግን ቁሩብ ዝወሓደ እዩ። ኣብ ሓመድ፣ ከውሒን ማይን ካብ ውሑዳት ክፋላት ኣብ ሓደ ሚልዮን ውሑድ ክፋል ብባህርያዊ መንገዲ ዝኽሰት ኮይኑ ካብ ከም ዩራኒናይት ዝኣመሰሉ ዩራንየም ዝሓዙ ማዕድናት ብንግዲ ይውሰድ።
translated_question: ምልክት Uን ኣቶሚክ ቁጽሪ 92ን ዘለዎ ኬሚካላዊ ባእታ እንታይ እዩ?

passage: During the 18th century, systems of plant identification were developed comparable to dichotomous keys, where unidentified plants are placed into taxonomic groups (e.g. family, genus and species) by making a series of choices between pairs of characters. The choice and sequence of the characters may be artificial in keys designed purely for identification (diagnostic keys) or more closely related to the natural or phyletic order of the taxa in synoptic keys. By the 18th century, new plants for study were arriving in Europe in increasing numbers from newly discovered countries and the European colonies worldwide. In 1753 Carl von Linné (Carl Linnaeus) published his Species Plantarum, a hierarchical classification of plant species that remains the reference point for modern botanical nomenclature. This established a standardised binomial or two-part naming scheme where the first name represented the genus and the second identified the species within the genus. For the purposes of identification, Linnaeus's Systema Sexuale classified plants into 24 groups according to the number of their male sexual organs. The 24th group, Cryptogamia, included all plants with concealed reproductive parts, mosses, liverworts, ferns, algae and fungi.
question: In what century did plant identification become comparable to dichotomous keys?
translated_passage: ኣብ መበል 18 ክፍለ ዘመን፡ ስርዓታት ምልላይ ተኽሊ ምስ ዳይኮቶማዊ መፍትሕ ዝወዳደር ኮይኑ፡ መንነቶም ዘይተፈልጡ ተኽልታት ኣብ መንጎ ጽምዲ ገጸ ባህርያት ተኸታታሊ ምርጫታት ብምግባር ኣብ ስርዓተ-ምድብ (ንኣብነት ስድራቤት፡ ዓሌትን ዓሌትን) ይቕመጡ። ምርጫን ቅደም ተኸተልን ናይቶም ገጸ ባህርያት ንኣለሊኻውያን (መፍለጢ መፍትሕታት) ወይ ምስቲ ተፈጥሮኣዊ ወይ ፋይለቲክ ስርዓት ናይቲ ታክሳስ ኣብ ሲኖፕቲክ መፍትሕታት ብጽሩይ ዝተነድፉ መፍትሕታት ኣርቲፊሻል ክኸውን ይኽእል። ኣብ መበል 18 ክፍለ ዘመን፡ ሓደስቲ ተኽልታት መጽናዕቲ ኣብ ኤውሮጳ ካብ ሓደስቲ ዝተረኽቡ ሃገራትን ኣብ መላእ ዓለም ካብ ዝርከባ መግዛእቲ ኤውሮጳን ብዝውስኽ ቁጽሪ እናወሰኸ ይኸይድ ነበረ። ኣብ 1753 ካርል ፎን ሊነ (ካርል ሊኒየስ) ንዘመናዊ ስነ-ዕጽዋት ኣጸዋውዓ መወከሲ ነጥቢ ኮይኑ ዝጸንሐ ዓሌት ተኽሊ ዝኾነ ዓሌት ፕላንታሩም ኣሕተመ። እዚ ደረጃ ዝሓለወ ክልተ-ክፋል ስያመ ስኬም ኣቚሙ እቲ ቀዳማይ ስም ነቲ ጂነስ ዝውክል ኮይኑ እቲ ካልኣይ ድማ ኣብ ውሽጢ እቲ ዓሌት ንዘሎ ​​ዓይነት እንስሳ ዘለለዮ። ንዕላማታት መለለዪ፡ ናይ ሊናየስ ስርዓታ ጾታዊ ርክብ ኣብ 24 ጉጅለታት ብመሰረት ቁጽሪ ናይ ደቂ ተባዕትዮ ጾታዊ ኣካላቶም ኣብ 24 ጉጅለታት ይምደብ። መበል 24 ጉጅለ ክሪፕቶጋሚያ ንኹሎም ዝተሓብኡ ናይ ምፍራይ ክፍልታት ዘለዎም ተኽልታት፣ ሞስ፣ ሊቨርዎርትስ፣ ፈርንስ፣ ኣልጌን ፋንጋስን ዘጠቓለለ እዩ።
translated_question: ኣብ ኣየናይ ክፍለ ዘመን ምልላይ ተኽሊ ምስ ዳይኮቶሞስ መፍትሕ ዝወዳደር ኮይኑ?

translated_passage: ኣብ መበል 18 ክፍለ ዘመን፡ ስርዓታት ምልላይ ተኽሊ ምስ ዳይኮቶማዊ መፍትሕ ዝወዳደር ኮይኑ፡ መንነቶም ዘይተፈልጡ ተኽልታት ኣብ መንጎ ጽምዲ ገጸ ባህርያት ተኸታታሊ ምርጫታት ብምግባር ኣብ ስርዓተ-ምድብ (ንኣብነት ስድራቤት፡ ዓሌትን ዓሌትን) ይቕመጡ። ምርጫን ቅደም ተኸተልን ናይቶም ገጸ ባህርያት ንኣለሊኻውያን (መፍለጢ መፍትሕታት) ወይ ምስቲ ተፈጥሮኣዊ ወይ ፋይለቲክ ስርዓት ናይቲ ታክሳስ ኣብ ሲኖፕቲክ መፍትሕታት ብጽሩይ ዝተነድፉ መፍትሕታት ኣርቲፊሻል ክኸውን ይኽእል። ኣብ መበል 18 ክፍለ ዘመን፡ ሓደስቲ ተኽልታት መጽናዕቲ ኣብ ኤውሮጳ ካብ ሓደስቲ ዝተረኽቡ ሃገራትን ኣብ መላእ ዓለም ካብ ዝርከባ መግዛእቲ ኤውሮጳን ብዝውስኽ ቁጽሪ እናወሰኸ ይኸይድ ነበረ። ኣብ 1753 ካርል ፎን ሊነ (ካርል ሊኒየስ) ንዘመናዊ ስነ-ዕጽዋት ኣጸዋውዓ መወከሲ ነጥቢ ኮይኑ ዝጸንሐ ዓሌት ተኽሊ ዝኾነ ዓሌት ፕላንታሩም ኣሕተመ። እዚ ደረጃ ዝሓለወ ክልተ-ክፋል ስያመ ስኬም ኣቚሙ እቲ ቀዳማይ ስም ነቲ ጂነስ ዝውክል ኮይኑ እቲ ካልኣይ ድማ ኣብ ውሽጢ እቲ ዓሌት ንዘሎ ​​ዓይነት እንስሳ ዘለለዮ። ንዕላማታት መለለዪ፡ ናይ ሊናየስ ስርዓታ ጾታዊ ርክብ ኣብ 24 ጉጅለታት ብመሰረት ቁጽሪ ናይ ደቂ ተባዕትዮ ጾታዊ ኣካላቶም ኣብ 24 ጉጅለታት ይምደብ። መበል 24 ጉጅለ ክሪፕቶጋሚያ ንኹሎም ዝተሓብኡ ናይ ምፍራይ ክፍልታት ዘለዎም ተኽልታት፣ ሞስ፣ ሊቨርዎርትስ፣ ፈርንስ፣ ኣልጌን ፋንጋስን ዘጠቓለለ እዩ።

passage: At high altitudes, Neptune's atmosphere is 80% hydrogen and 19% helium. A trace amount of methane is also present. Prominent absorption bands of methane exist at wavelengths above 600 nm, in the red and infrared portion of the spectrum. As with Uranus, this absorption of red light by the atmospheric methane is part of what gives Neptune its blue hue, although Neptune's vivid azure differs from Uranus's milder cyan. Because Neptune's atmospheric methane content is similar to that of Uranus, some unknown atmospheric constituent is thought to contribute to Neptune's colour.
question: What percentage of Neptune's atmosphere is hydrogen?
translated_passage: ኣብ ልዑል ቁመት፡ ከባቢ ኔፕቱነ 80% ሃይድሮጅንን 19% ሄልዩምን እዩ። ኣሰር መጠን ሜታን እውን ኣሎ። ጐሊሖም ዝረኣዩ ናይ ምምጣጥ ባንድታት ናይ ሚቴን ኣብ ልዕሊ 600 ና.ሜ ማዕበል፣ ኣብ ቀይሕን ትሕተ ቀይሕን ክፋል ናይቲ ስፔክትረም ይህልዉ። ከምቲ ኣብ ዩራንየስ ዝግበር፡ እዚ ብኤትሞስፈርያዊ ሚቴን ዝመጽእ ቀይሕ ብርሃን ምምጣጥ ኣካል ናይቲ ንነፕቱነ ሰማያዊ ልቡ ዝህቦ’ዩ፡ ዋላ’ኳ እቲ ንጹር ኣዙር ናይ ኔፕቱነ ካብቲ ናይ ዩራንየስ ልኡም ስያን እንተተፈለየ። ምኽንያቱ ናይ ኔፕቱነ ናይ ኣትሞስፈርያዊ ሚቴን ትሕዝቶ ምስ ናይ ዩራንስ ስለ ዝመሳሰል፡ ገለ ዘይፍለጥ ኣትሞስፈርያዊ ኣካል ንሕብሪ ኔፕቱነ ኣበርክቶ ከም ዘለዎ ይግመት።

passage: The Twelve Tables forbade any harmful incantation (malum carmen, or 'noisome metrical charm'); this included the "charming of crops from one field to another" (excantatio frugum) and any rite that sought harm or death to others. Chthonic deities functioned at the margins of Rome's divine and human communities; although sometimes the recipients of public rites, these were conducted outside the sacred boundary of the pomerium. Individuals seeking their aid did so away from the public gaze, during the hours of darkness. Burial grounds and isolated crossroads were among the likely portals. The barrier between private religious practices and "magic" is permeable, and Ovid gives a vivid account of rites at the fringes of the public Feralia festival that are indistinguishable from magic: an old woman squats among a circle of younger women, sews up a fish-head, smears it with pitch, then pierces and roasts it to "bind hostile tongues to silence". By this she invokes Tacita, the "Silent One" of the underworld.
question: What forbade harmful incantation?
translated_passage: እቶም ዓሰርተው ክልተ ሰሌዳታት ዝኾነ ይኹን ጎዳኢ ዘይምህላው (ናይ ማሉም ካርመን ወይ 'NoiSome Metrical Charm') ይኽልክሉ፤ እዚ ድማ "ካብ ሓደ ግራት ናብ ካልእ ሜዳ ምምላእ ዝራእቲ" (excantatio frugum) ከምኡ’ውን ዝኾነ ይኹን ኣብ ልዕሊ ካልኦት ጉድኣት ወይ ሞት ዝሓትት ስርዓትን ዘጠቓለለ እዩ። ቻቶኒክ ኣማልኽቲ ኣብ ወሰን መለኮታውን ሰብኣውን ማሕበረሰባት ሮማ ይሰርሑ ነበሩ፤ ሓደ ሓደ ግዜ ተቐበልቲ ህዝባዊ ስርዓታት እኳ እንተኾኑ፡ እዚኦም ግን ካብቲ ቅዱስ ዶብ ናይቲ ፖመርየም ወጻኢ እዮም ተኻይዶም። ሓገዝቶም ዝደልዩ ውልቀሰባት ካብቲ ህዝቢ ኣዒንቶም ርሒቖም፡ ኣብ ሰዓታት ጸልማት። ቀብሪን ዝተነጸለ መስቀላዊ መንገዲን ካብቶም ክኾኑ ዝኽእሉ ፖርታላት እዩ ነይሩ። ኣብ መንጎ ናይ ብሕቲ ሃይማኖታዊ ልምድታትን "ማጂክ"ን ዘሎ ዕንቅፋት ዘሕልፍ እዩ፣ ኦቪድ ድማ ኣብ ጫፍ ናይቲ ካብ ስሕተት ዘይፍለ ኣብ ጫፍ ናይቲ ህዝባዊ ፈስቲቫል ፈራሊያ ንጹር ጸብጻብ ይህብ: ሓንቲ ኣረጊት ሰበይቲ ኣብ መንጎ ዓንኬል መንእሰያት ደቂ ኣንስትዮ ትጭብጥ፣ ርእሲ ዓሳ ትስፍይ፣ ብድምጺ ትሰቕሎ፣ ድሕሪኡ ንሲልታስ ንሲልታ ትገብሮ ትጥፍኦ። በዚ ድማ ንታሲታ ትብል "ሻቕሊ ሓንቲ" ናይ ትሕቲ መሬት ትጽውዕ።
translated_question: እንታይ ከልከለ ጎዳኢ ምኽልካል?

passage: The Twelve Tables forbade any harmful incantation (malum carmen, or 'noisome metrical charm'); this included the "charming of crops from one field to another" (excantatio frugum) and any rite that sought harm or death to others. Chthonic deities functioned at the margins of Rome's divine and human communities; although sometimes the recipients of public rites, these were conducted outside the sacred boundary of the pomerium. Individuals seeking their aid did so away from the public gaze, during the hours of darkness. Burial grounds and isolated crossroads were among the likely portals. The barrier between private religious practices and "magic" is permeable, and Ovid gives a vivid account of rites at the fringes of the public Feralia festival that are indistinguishable from magic: an old woman squats among a circle of younger women, sews up a fish-head, smears it with pitch, then pierces and roasts it to "bind hostile tongues to silence". By this she invokes Tacita, the "Silent One" of the underworld.
question: What forbade harmful incantation?

passage: French historians traditionally place the Enlightenment between 1715, the year that Louis XIV died, and 1789, the beginning of the French Revolution. Some recent historians begin the period in the 1620s, with the start of the scientific revolution. The Philosophes, the French term for the philosophers of the period, widely circulated their ideas through meetings at scientific academies, Masonic lodges, literary salons and coffee houses, and through printed books and pamphlets. The ideas of the Enlightenment undermined the authority of the monarchy and the church, and paved the way for the revolutions of the 18th and 19th centuries. A variety of 19th-century movements, including liberalism and neo-classicism, trace their intellectual heritage back to the Enlightenment.
question: What country typically placed the Enlightenment between 1715 and 1789?
translated_passage: ፈረንሳውያን ጸሓፍቲ ታሪኽ ብባህሊ ነቲ ኣብ መንጎ 1715 ዝነበረ ምብራህ የቐምጥዎ፣ እታ ሉዊስ መበል 14 ዝሞተላ ዓመት፣ 1789 ድማ መጀመርታ ሰውራ ፈረንሳ። ገለ ኣብ ቀረባ እዋን ዝነበሩ ጸሓፍቲ ታሪኽ፡ ነቲ ኣብ 1620ታት ዝነበረ እዋን ይጅምሩ፡ ምስ ምጅማር ሳይንሳዊ ሰውራ። እቲ ፍልስፍናታት፣ እቲ ፈረንሳዊ ቃል ንፈላስፋታት ናይቲ እዋን ዝነበረ፣ ኣብ ሳይንሳዊ ኣካዳሚታት፣ ማሶናዊ ሎጅ፣ ስነ-ጽሑፋዊ ሳሎናትን ቡንን ኣቢሎም ብዝግበር ኣኼባታት ሓሳባቶም ብሰፊሑ ዘዘዋወሩ ሓሳባቶም ብሰፊሑ ኣዘዋዊሮም ኣቢሎም። እቲ ናይ ምብራህ ሓሳባት ንስልጣን ንግስነትን ቤተ ክርስቲያንን ኣዳኺሙ፣ ንሰውራታት መበል 18ን 19ን ዘመናት ድማ መንገዲ ጸሪጉ። ዝተፈላለዩ ናይ መበል 19 ክፍለ ዘመን ምንቅስቓሳት፡ እንተላይ ሊበራሊዝምን ኒዮ-ክላሲሲዝምን፡ ንኣእምሮኣዊ ውርሻኦም ናብ ምብራህ ይከታተሎም።

passage: The Dutch East India Company had founded the Cape Colony on the southern tip of Africa in 1652 as a way station for its ships travelling to and from its colonies in the East Indies. Britain formally acquired the colony, and its large Afrikaner (or Boer) population in 1806, having occupied it in 1795 to prevent its falling into French hands, following the invasion of the Netherlands by France. British immigration began to rise after 1820, and pushed thousands of Boers, resentful of British rule, northwards to found their own—mostly short-lived—independent republics, during the Great Trek of the late 1830s and early 1840s. In the process the Voortrekkers clashed repeatedly with the British, who had their own agenda with regard to colonial expansion in South Africa and with several African polities, including those of the Sotho and the Zulu nations. Eventually the Boers established two republics which had a longer lifespan: the South African Republic or Transvaal Republic (1852–77; 1881–1902) and the Orange Free State (1854–1902). In 1902 Britain occupied both republics, concluding a treaty with the two Boer Republics following the Second Boer War (1899–1902).
question: In what year did the Dutch East India Company establish the Cape Colony?
translated_passage: እቲ ናይ ሆላንድ ምብራቕ ህንዲ ኩባንያ፡ ነቲ ኣብ ደቡባዊ ጫፍ ኣፍሪቃ ኣብ 1652 ኣብ ደቡባዊ ጫፍ ኣፍሪቃ ዝርከብ ኬፕ ኮሎኒ መስሪቱ ነይሩ፡ ኣብ ምብራቕ ኢንዲስ ካብን ናብን መግዛእቲ ዝጓዓዛ መራኽብ መራኽባ ከም መገዲ መደበር ኮይኑ መሲልዋ ነበረ። ብሪጣንያ ነቲ መግዛእቲ፡ ከምኡ’ውን ነቲ ኣብ 1806 ዝነበረ ዓቢ ህዝቢ ኣፍሪካነር (ወይ ቦር) ብወግዒ ኣጥረየቶ፡ እዚ ድማ ድሕሪ ወራር ሆላንድ ብፈረንሳ፡ ኣብ ኢድ ፈረንሳ ከይወድቕ ኣብ 1795 ስለ ዝኣተዋ። ስደት እንግሊዝ ድሕሪ 1820 ክለዓል ጀመረ፣ ኣብ መወዳእታ 1830ታትን መጀመርታ 1840ታትን ድማ ኣብ ዓቢ ጕዕዞ 1830ታትን መጀመርታ 1840ታትን፡ ናይ ገዛእ ርእሶም - መብዛሕትኡ ሓጺር ዕድመ ዘለዎም ሪፓብሊካት ንምርካቦም፡ ንኣሽሓት ቦርስ ዝደፍአ ቦርስ ደፊኡ። ኣብቲ መስርሕ ቮርትረከርስ ምስቲ ኣብ ደቡብ ኣፍሪቃ ንመግዛእታዊ ምስፍሕፋሕን ምስ ሓያሎ ኣፍሪቃውያን ፖለቲካታትን፡ እንተላይ ምስ ናይ ሶቶን ዙሉ ሃገራትን፡ ናይ ገዛእ ርእሶም ኣጀንዳ ዝነበሮም እንግሊዛውያን ብተደጋጋሚ ተጋጭዮም። ኣብ መወዳእታ እቶም ቦር ዝነውሐ ዕድመ ዝነበሮም ክልተ ሪፓብሊካት ኣጣይሹ: ሪፓብሊክ ደቡብ ኣፍሪቃ ወይ ትራንስቫል ሪፓብሊክ (1852–77; 1881–1902) ከምኡውን ኣራንሺ ፍሪ ስቴት (1854–1902)። ኣብ 1902 ብሪጣንያ ንኽልቲአን ሪፓብሊካት ሒዛ፡ ድሕሪ ካልኣይ ኲናት ቦር (1899–1902) ምስተን ክልተ ቦር ሪፓብሊካት ውዕል ዛዚማ።
translated_question: ኣብ ኣየናይ ዓመት እዩ እቲ ናይ ሆላንድ ምብራቕ ህንዲ ኩባንያ ንኬፕ ኮሎኒ መስሪቱ?

passage: The Dutch East India Company had founded the Cape Colony on the southern tip of Africa in 1652 as a way station for its ships travelling to and from its colonies in the East Indies. Britain formally acquired the colony, and its large Afrikaner (or Boer) population in 1806, having occupied it in 1795 to prevent its falling into French hands, following the invasion of the Netherlands by France. British immigration began to rise after 1820, and pushed thousands of Boers, resentful of British rule, northwards to found their own—mostly short-lived—independent republics, during the Great Trek of the late 1830s and early 1840s. In the process the Voortrekkers clashed repeatedly with the British, who had their own agenda with regard to colonial expansion in South Africa and with several African polities, including those of the Sotho and the Zulu nations. Eventually the Boers established two republics which had a longer lifespan: the South African Republic or Transvaal Republic (1852–77; 1881–1902) and the Orange Free State (1854–1902). In 1902 Britain occupied both republics, concluding a treaty with the two Boer Republics following the Second Boer War (1899–1902).
question: In what year did the Dutch East India Company establish the Cape Colony?

passage: One facet of the changing attitude toward Korea and whether to get involved was Japan. Especially after the fall of China to the Communists, U.S. East Asian experts saw Japan as the critical counterweight to the Soviet Union and China in the region. While there was no United States policy that dealt with South Korea directly as a national interest, its proximity to Japan increased the importance of South Korea. Said Kim: "The recognition that the security of Japan required a non-hostile Korea led directly to President Truman's decision to intervene... The essential point... is that the American response to the North Korean attack stemmed from considerations of US policy toward Japan."
question: What country had a changing attitude toward Korea?
translated_passage: ሓደ ገጽ ናይቲ ኣብ ልዕሊ ኮርያ ዝነበረ ምቕያር ኣተሓሳስባን ኣብ ጉዳይ ምእታው ድዩ ኣይኣቱን ጃፓን እዩ። ብፍላይ ድሕሪ ምውዳቓ ቻይና ኣብ ኮሚኒስት፡ ክኢላታት ምብራቕ ኤስያ ኣመሪካ፡ ጃፓን ንማሕበር ሶቭየት፡ ኣብቲ ዞባ ንቻይና ከም ወሳኒት መቃለሲት ርእዮማ። ንደቡብ ኮርያ ብቐጥታ ከም ሃገራዊ ረብሓ ዝምልከት ፖሊሲ ሕቡራት መንግስታት ኣመሪካ እኳ እንተዘይነበረ፡ ምስ ጃፓን ዘለዋ ቅርበት ግን ኣገዳስነት ደቡብ ኮርያ ኣዕብያቶ። ኪም ከምዚ ኢሉ: "ድሕነት ጃፓን ንዘይተኸላኸለ ኮርያ ከም ዝጠልብ ኣፍልጦ ብቐጥታ ናብቲ ፕረዚደንት ትሩማን ጣልቃ ንኽኣቱ ዝወሰዶ ውሳነ ዝመርሐ... እቲ ኣገዳሲ ነጥቢ... እቲ ኣመሪካዊ መልሲ ንመጥቃዕቲ ሰሜን ኮርያ ኣመሪካ ካብቲ ኣብ ልዕሊ ጃፓን ዝነበረ ፖሊሲ ኣሜሪካ ኣብ ግምት ዘእተወ ምዃኑ እዩ" ኢሉ።

passage: In May 1985, Gorbachev delivered a speech in Leningrad advocating reforms and an anti-alcohol campaign to tackle widespread alcoholism. Prices on vodka, wine, and beer were raised in order to make these drinks more expensive and a disincentive to consumers, and the introduction of rationing. Unlike most forms of rationing intended to conserve scarce goods, this was done to restrict sales with the overt goal of curtailing drunkenness. Gorbachev's plan also included billboards promoting sobriety, increased penalties for public drunkenness, and to censor drinking scenes from old movies. Although this program was not a direct copycat of Tsar Nicholas II's outright prohibition during World War I, Gorbachev faced the same adverse economic reaction as did the last Tsar. The disincentivization of alcohol consumption was a serious blow to the state budget according to Alexander Yakovlev, who noted annual collections of alcohol taxes decreased by 100 billion rubles. Alcohol production migrated to the black market, or through moonshining as some made "bathtub vodka" with homegrown potatoes. Poorer, less educated Russians resorted to drinking unhealthy substitutes such as nail polish, rubbing alcohol or men's cologne, which only served to be an additional burden on Russia's healthcare sector due to the subsequent poisoning cases. The purpose of these reforms, however, was to prop up the existing centrally planned economy, unlike later reforms, which tended toward market socialism.
question: Where did Gorbachev deliver a speech in May 1985?

translated_question: ጎርባቸቭ ኣብ ግንቦት 1985 መደረ ኣበይ እዩ ዘቕረበ?

passage: In May 1985, Gorbachev delivered a speech in Leningrad advocating reforms and an anti-alcohol campaign to tackle widespread alcoholism. Prices on vodka, wine, and beer were raised in order to make these drinks more expensive and a disincentive to consumers, and the introduction of rationing. Unlike most forms of rationing intended to conserve scarce goods, this was done to restrict sales with the overt goal of curtailing drunkenness. Gorbachev's plan also included billboards promoting sobriety, increased penalties for public drunkenness, and to censor drinking scenes from old movies. Although this program was not a direct copycat of Tsar Nicholas II's outright prohibition during World War I, Gorbachev faced the same adverse economic reaction as did the last Tsar. The disincentivization of alcohol consumption was a serious blow to the state budget according to Alexander Yakovlev, who noted annual collections of alcohol taxes decreased by 100 billion rubles. Alcohol production migrated to the black market, or through moonshining as some made "bathtub vodka" with homegrown potatoes. Poorer, less educated Russians resorted to drinking unhealthy substitutes such as nail polish, rubbing alcohol or men's cologne, which only served to be an additional burden on Russia's healthcare sector due to the subsequent poisoning cases. The purpose of these reforms, however, was to prop up the existing centrally planned economy, unlike later reforms, which tended toward market socialism.
question: Where did Gorbachev deliver a speech in May 1985?

passage: At the inception of the Premier League in 1992–93, just eleven players named in the starting line-ups for the first round of matches hailed from outside of the United Kingdom or Ireland. By 2000–01, the number of foreign players participating in the Premier League was 36 per cent of the total. In the 2004–05 season the figure had increased to 45 per cent. On 26 December 1999, Chelsea became the first Premier League side to field an entirely foreign starting line-up, and on 14 February 2005 Arsenal were the first to name a completely foreign 16-man squad for a match. By 2009, under 40% of the players in the Premier League were English.
question: In what year was there just 11 players outside of England and Ireland who started in the Premier League?
translated_passage: ኣብ 1992–93 ኣብ ምጅማር ፕረምየርሊግ፡ ኣብ መጀመርታ መስርዕ ተሰምዮም ዝነበሩ ዓሰርተ ሓደ ተጻወትቲ ጥራይ፡ ካብ ዓዲ እንግሊዝ ወይ ኣየርላንድ ወጻኢ ንዝነኣዱ ቀዳማይ ዙርያ ጸወታታት ዝንኣዱ እዮም። ኣብ 2000–01 ቁጽሪ ናይቶም ኣብ ፕረምየርሊግ ዝሳተፉ ናይ ወጻኢ ተጻወትቲ ካብቲ ጠቕላላ 36 ሚእታዊት ነይሩ። ኣብ 2004–05 ወቕቲ እቲ ኣሃዝ ናብ 45 ሚእታዊት ወሲኹ። ብዕለት 26 ታሕሳስ 1999 ቸልሲ ንሙሉእ ናይ ወጻኢ መበገሲ መስመር ንምቕማጥ ናይ መጀመርታ ጋንታ ፕረምየርሊግ ኮይና፡ ብ14 ለካቲት 2005 ኣርሰናል ድማ ንሓንቲ ጸወታ ምሉእ ብምሉእ ናይ ወጻኢ 16 ተጻወትቲ ዝሓዘት ጋንታ ንፈለማ እዋን ክትጽዋዕ ክኢላ። ኣብ 2009 ትሕቲ 40% ተጻወትቲ ፕረምየርሊግ እንግሊዝኛ ኮይኑ።

translated_passage: ኣብ 1992–93 ኣብ ምጅማር ፕረምየርሊግ፡ ኣብ መጀመርታ መስርዕ ተሰምዮም ዝነበሩ ዓሰርተ ሓደ ተጻወትቲ ጥራይ፡ ካብ ዓዲ እንግሊዝ ወይ ኣየርላንድ ወጻኢ ንዝነኣዱ ቀዳማይ ዙርያ ጸወታታት ዝንኣዱ እዮም። ኣብ 2000–01 ቁጽሪ ናይቶም ኣብ ፕረምየርሊግ ዝሳተፉ ናይ ወጻኢ ተጻወትቲ ካብቲ ጠቕላላ 36 ሚእታዊት ነይሩ። ኣብ 2004–05 ወቕቲ እቲ ኣሃዝ ናብ 45 ሚእታዊት ወሲኹ። ብዕለት 26 ታሕሳስ 1999 ቸልሲ ንሙሉእ ናይ ወጻኢ መበገሲ መስመር ንምቕማጥ ናይ መጀመርታ ጋንታ ፕረምየርሊግ ኮይና፡ ብ14 ለካቲት 2005 ኣርሰናል ድማ ንሓንቲ ጸወታ ምሉእ ብምሉእ ናይ ወጻኢ 16 ተጻወትቲ ዝሓዘት ጋንታ ንፈለማ እዋን ክትጽዋዕ ክኢላ። ኣብ 2009 ትሕቲ 40% ተጻወትቲ ፕረምየርሊግ እንግሊዝኛ ኮይኑ።

translated_passage: እዚ ውን ናይ ለይቲ ክለባት ናይ ኣማራጺታት ግዜ እዩ ነይሩ፣ ናይ መኽዘን ፓርቲ፣ ኣሲድ ገዛ፣ ራቭን ናይ ደገ ፈስቲቫል ትርኢታት ናይ መወዳእታ 1980ታትን መጀመርታ 1990ታትን ንዝሓሸ ዝንባለታት ኣብ ኤሌክትሮኒካዊ ሳዕስዒት ሙዚቃ መዕቆቢታት ነይሮም፣ ብፍላይ ድማ ገዛን ንዘልኣለም ዝያዳ-ዝያዳ ሂፕኖቲክን፣ ስነ-ጥበባዊ ጨንፈር ቴክኖኡን ታንክኖስን፣ ከም መኽፈቲ ዋርሳው ዝፈትውዎ ክለባትን ካባታ ዝፍለጡ ክለባትን ዝፍለጡ ክለባትን (መን እዩ እቲ ነባሪ ዲጄ ንኽልቲኡን ሬድዮን ። እቲ ሓድሽ ድምጺ ኣብ መላእ ሃገር ናብ ቀንዲ ክለባት ተመሊሱ። እቲ ኣብ ሶቤ ዝነበረ ትርኢት፡ ምስ ሓደ ዕሙር ካልኣይ ኢድ ዕዳጋ ኤሌክትሮኒካዊ መሳርሕታትን ተርንቴብልን፡ ሓያል ዲሞክራስያዊ ውጽኢት ነይርዎ፡ ኣማተር፡ "መደቀሲ" ዲጄታት ንዲጄታት ከም ናይ ሙዚቃን ኣፍረይትን ንብቑዓትን ህቡባትን ናይ ምዃን ዕድል ዝህብ፡ ናይ ሞያዊ ሙዚቃን ክለባት ኢንዱስትሪታትን ፍንጣጣ ብዘየገድስ፡ ንብቑዕን ህቡብን ክኸውን ዕድል ዝህብ ነበረ። ገለ ካብዞም ፍሉጣት ዲጄታት ጆን ቤኔቲዝ (ዝሓሸ ጀሊቢን ቤኔቲዝ)፡ ዳኒ ቴናግልያን ዴቪድ ፓዲላን ዝፍለጡ እዮም።

passage: Columbia founded Epic Records in 1953. In 1956, Conkling left Columbia, he would help establish the National Academy of Recording Arts and Sciences before eventually becoming the first president of the newly launched Warner Bros. Records, and Goddard Lieberson began the first of two stints as head of the record company. In 1958, Columbia founded another label, Date Records, which initially issued rockabilly music.
question: Who created Epic Records?
translated_passage: ኮሎምብያ ኣብ 1953 ኤፒክ መዛግብቲ መስሪታ።ኣብ 1956፡ ካብ ኮሎምብያ ጸጋም ኮሎምብያ ኮንክሊንግ፡ ንሃገራዊ ኣካዳሚ ስነ-ጥበብን ስነ-ፍልጠትን ንምምስራት ክሕግዝ እዩ ኣብ መወዳእታ ናይ መጀመርታ ፕረዚደንት ናይቲ ሓድሽ ዝተጀመረ ዋርነር ብሮስ መዛግብቲ ምዃኑ፡ ጎዳርድድ ሊበርሰን ድማ ከም ሓላፊ ናይቲ መዝገብ ኩባንያ ካብ ክልተ ስንጥቆታት ቀዳማይ ጀሚሩ። ኣብ 1958 ኮሎምብያ ካልእ ትካል ዕደት መዛግብቲ መስሪታ፡ ኣብ መጀመርታ ሮካቢሊ ሙዚቃ ኣውጺኣ።
translated_question: መን እዩ ኤፒክ መዛግብቲ ዝፈጠረ?

passage: In 1954, then-mayor Richard C. Lee began some of the earliest major urban renewal projects in the United States. Certain sections of downtown New Haven were redeveloped to include museums, new office towers, a hotel, and large shopping complexes. Other parts of the city were affected by the construction of Interstate 95 along the Long Wharf section, Interstate 91, and the Oak Street Connector. The Oak Street Connector (Route 34), running between Interstate 95, downtown, and The Hill neighborhood, was originally intended as a highway to the city's western suburbs but was only completed as a highway to the downtown area, with the area to the west becoming a boulevard (See "Redevelopment" below).
question: What mayor in New Haven began some of the earliest major urban renewal projects in the US?
translated_passage: ኣብ 1954፡ ናይ ሽዑ ከንቲባ ሪቻርድ ሲ ሊ፡ ገለ ካብቶም ቀዳሞት ዓበይቲ ፕሮጀክትታት ምሕዳስ ከተማ ኣብ ኣመሪካ ጀመረ። ገለ ክፋላት ናይ ማእከል ከተማ ኒው ሄቨን፡ ቤተ-መዘክር፡ ሓደስቲ ግምብታት ቤት ጽሕፈት፡ ሆቴልን ዓበይቲ ናይ ዕዳጋ ውህደታትን ንኸጠቓልል ዳግማይ ተማዕቢሉ። ካልኦት ክፋላት እታ ከተማ ድማ ብህንፀት ኢንተርስቴት 95 ኣብ ክፍሊ ነዊሕ መራኽብ መራኽብ፣ ኢንተርስቴት 91፣ ከምኡውን ኦክ ስትሪት ኮኔክተር ተጸልዮም እዮም። እቲ ኣብ መንጎ ኢንተርስቴት 95፡ ማእከል ከተማን ጎቦን ከባቢ ዝጎዓዝ ናይ ኦክ ስትሪት መተሓላለፊ (መንገዲ 34)፡ ፈለማ ናብ ምዕራባዊ ከባቢታት እታ ከተማ ከም ጽርግያ ከም ጽርግያ ተሓሲቡ ነይሩ፡ ናብ ከባቢ ማእከል ከተማ ጥራይ ከም ጽርግያ ጥራይ እዩ ተዛዚሙ፡ እቲ ናብ ምዕራብ ዝነበረ ከባቢ ድማ ቦውለቫርድ ኮይኑ ("redevelopment" ርአ ኣብ ታሕቲ ርአ)።
translated_question: ኣብ ኒው ሄቨን ከንቲባ እንታይ እዩ ገለ ካብቶም ቀዳሞት ዓበይቲ ናይ ከተማ ምሕዳስ ፕሮጀክትታት ኣብ ኣሜሪካ ዝጀመረ?

passage: In 1775, Patrick Henry delivered his famous "Give me Liberty or Give me Death" speech in St. John's Church in Richmond, crucial for deciding Virginia's participation in the First Continental Congress and setting the course for revolution and independence. On April 18, 1780, the state capital was moved from the colonial capital of Williamsburg to Richmond, to provide a more centralized location for Virginia's increasing westerly population, as well as to isolate the capital from British attack. The latter motive proved to be in vain, and in 1781, under the command of Benedict Arnold, Richmond was burned by British troops, causing Governor Thomas Jefferson to flee as the Virginia militia, led by Sampson Mathews, defended the city.
question: Where did Patrick Henry deliver his famous speech in Richmond?
translated_passage: ኣብ 1775 ፓትሪክ ሄንሪ ኣብ ሪችሞንድ ኣብ ዝርከብ ቤተ ክርስቲያን ቅዱስ ዮሃንስ ኣብ ዝርከብ ቤተ ክርስቲያን ቅዱስ ዮሃንስ ዝሃብዎ ፍሉጥ "ሃብኒ ወይ ሞት ክህቡኒ" ዝብል ፍሉጥ መደረኡ ኣረከበ፣ እዚ ድማ ቨርጂንያ ኣብቲ ናይ መጀመርታ ኮንቲነንታል ኮንግረስ ተሳትፎ ንምስታፍን ንሰውራን ናጽነትን ዝኸውን ኮርስ ንምቕማጥን ወሳኒ እዩ። ብ18 ሚያዝያ 1780 ርእሰ ከተማ እታ ግዝኣት ካብ መግዛእታዊት ርእሰ ከተማ ዊልያምስበርግ ናብ ሪችሞንድ ተሰጋጊራ፡ ነቲ እናወሰኸ ዝኸይድ ዘሎ ምዕራባዊ ህዝቢ ቨርጂንያ ዝያዳ ማእከላይ ቦታ ንምሃብ፡ ከምኡ’ውን ካብ መጥቃዕቲ እንግሊዝ ዝመጸት ርእሰ-ማል ንምንጻል። እቲ ዳሕረዋይ ድራኸ ከንቱ ምዃኑ ተረጋጊጹ፣ ኣብ 1781 ድማ፣ ኣብ ትሕቲ ትእዛዝ በነዲክቶስ ኣርኖልድ፣ ሪችሞንድ ብወተሃደራት እንግሊዝ ተቓጺሉ፣ ኣመሓዳሪ ቶማስ ጀፈርሰን ብሳምፕሰን ማቲውስ ዝምራሕ ቨርጂንያ ሚሊሻታት ንከተማ ክከላኸለሉ ገይርዎ።
translated_question: ፓትሪክ ሄንሪ ነቲ ፍሉጥ መደረኡ ኣብ ሪችሞንድ ኣበይ ኣቕሪቡ?

The latter motive proved to be in vain, and in 1781, under the command of Benedict Arnold, Richmond was burned by British troops, causing Governor Thomas Jefferson to flee as the Virginia militia, led by Sampson Mathews, defended the city.
question: Where did Patrick Henry deliver his famous speech in Richmond?
translated_passage: ኣብ 1775 ፓትሪክ ሄንሪ ኣብ ሪችሞንድ ኣብ ዝርከብ ቤተ ክርስቲያን ቅዱስ ዮሃንስ ኣብ ዝርከብ ቤተ ክርስቲያን ቅዱስ ዮሃንስ ዝሃብዎ ፍሉጥ "ሃብኒ ወይ ሞት ክህቡኒ" ዝብል ፍሉጥ መደረኡ ኣረከበ፣ እዚ ድማ ቨርጂንያ ኣብቲ ናይ መጀመርታ ኮንቲነንታል ኮንግረስ ተሳትፎ ንምስታፍን ንሰውራን ናጽነትን ዝኸውን ኮርስ ንምቕማጥን ወሳኒ እዩ። ብ18 ሚያዝያ 1780 ርእሰ ከተማ እታ ግዝኣት ካብ መግዛእታዊት ርእሰ ከተማ ዊልያምስበርግ ናብ ሪችሞንድ ተሰጋጊራ፡ ነቲ እናወሰኸ ዝኸይድ ዘሎ ምዕራባዊ ህዝቢ ቨርጂንያ ዝያዳ ማእከላይ ቦታ ንምሃብ፡ ከምኡ’ውን ካብ መጥቃዕቲ እንግሊዝ ዝመጸት ርእሰ-ማል ንምንጻል። እቲ ዳሕረዋይ ድራኸ ከንቱ ምዃኑ ተረጋጊጹ፣ ኣብ 1781 ድማ፣ ኣብ ትሕቲ ትእዛዝ በነዲክቶስ ኣርኖልድ፣ ሪችሞንድ ብወተሃደራት እንግሊዝ ተቓጺሉ፣ ኣመሓዳሪ ቶማስ ጀፈርሰን ብሳምፕሰን ማቲውስ ዝምራሕ ቨርጂንያ ሚሊሻታት ንከተማ ክከላኸለሉ ገይርዎ።

passage: In the early 21st century, the population of Paris began to increase slowly again, as more young people moved into the city. It reached 2.25 million in 2011. In March 2001, Bertrand Delanoë became the first socialist mayor of Paris. In 2007, in an effort to reduce car traffic in the city, he introduced the Vélib', a system which rents bicycles for the use of local residents and visitors. Bertrand Delanoë also transformed a section of the highway along the left bank of the Seine into an urban promenade and park, the Promenade des Berges de la Seine, which he inaugurated in June 2013.
question: When did Paris start to increase slowly again?
translated_passage: ኣብ መጀመርታ መበል 21 ክፍለ ዘመን፡ ዝበዝሑ መንእሰያት ናብታ ከተማ እናሰጋገሩ ምስ ከዱ፡ ህዝቢ ፓሪስ መሊሱ ቀስ ኢሉ ክውስኽ ጀመረ። ኣብ 2011 2.25 ሚልዮን በጺሑ።ኣብ መጋቢት 2001 በርትራንድ ደላኖይ ናይ መጀመርታ ሶሻሊስት ከንቲባ ፓሪስ ኮይኑ። ኣብ 2007 ኣብታ ከተማ ንዝነበረ ትራፊክ መኪና ንምንካይ ኣብ ዝገበሮ ጻዕሪ፡ ነቲ ንኣጠቓቕማ ነበርቲ እቲ ከባቢን በጻሕትን ብሽክለታ ዝካረየሉ ስርዓት ቬሊብ' ኣተኣታትዩ። በርትራንድ ደላኖይ እውን ንሓደ ክፋል ናይቲ ብጸጋማይ ገምገም ናይቲ ሴይን ዝነበረ ጽርግያ ናብ ከተማዊ መንቀሳቐሲን መናፈሻን ቀይርዎ፣ እዚ ድማ ኣብ ሰነ 2013 ዝተመረቐ መዘናግዒ ደስ በርገስ ደ ላ ሴይን እዩ።

passage: Uranium is a chemical element with symbol U and atomic number 92. It is a silvery-white metal in the actinide series of the periodic table. A uranium atom has 92 protons and 92 electrons, of which 6 are valence electrons. Uranium is weakly radioactive because all its isotopes are unstable (with half-lives of the six naturally known isotopes, uranium-233 to uranium-238, varying between 69 years and 4.5 billion years). The most common isotopes of uranium are uranium-238 (which has 146 neutrons and accounts for almost 99.3% of the uranium found in nature) and uranium-235 (which has 143 neutrons, accounting for 0.7% of the element found naturally). Uranium has the second highest atomic weight of the primordially occurring elements, lighter only than plutonium. Its density is about 70% higher than that of lead, but slightly lower than that of gold or tungsten. It occurs naturally in low concentrations of a few parts per million in soil, rock and water, and is commercially extracted from uranium-bearing minerals such as uraninite.
question: What is a chemical element with symbol U and atomic number 92?
translated_passage: ዩራንየም ምልክት Uን ኣቶሚክ ቁጽሪ 92ን ዘለዎ ኬሚካላዊ ባእታ እዩ።ኣብ ተኸታታሊ ናይ ፐርዮዲክ ሰሌዳ ኣክቲናይድ ብሩርን ጻዕዳን ብረት እዩ። ኣቶም ዩራንየም 92 ፕሮቶንን 92 ኤሌክትሮናትን ዘለዎ ኮይኑ ካብዚኦም እቶም 6 ቫለንስ ኤሌክትሮናት እዮም። ዩራንየም ድኹም ራድዮኣክቲቭ እዩ ምኽንያቱ ኩሎም ኣይሶቶፕታቱ ዘይርጉኣት ስለ ዝኾኑ (ፍቑራት ካብቶም ሽዱሽተ ብተፈጥሮ ዝፍለጡ ኣይሶቶፕስ፣ ዩራንየም-233 ክሳብ ዩራንየም-238፣ ኣብ መንጎ 69 ዓመትን 4.5 ቢልዮንን ዓመት ዝፈላለ)። እቶም ዝበዝሑ ልሙዳት ኣይሶቶፕስ ናይ ዩራንየም ዩራንየም-238 (እዚ 146 ኒውትሮን ዘለዎን ዳርጋ 99.3% ካብቲ ኣብ ተፈጥሮ ዝርከብ ዩራንየም)ን ዩራንየም-235ን (143 ኒውትሮን ዘለዎ ኮይኑ 0.7% ናይቲ ብተፈጥሮ ዝተረኽበ ባእታ ዝሕዝ) እዮም። ዩራንየም ካልኣይ ዝለዓለ ኣቶሚክ ክብደት ናይቶም ብመበቆላውያን ዝረኣዩ ባእታታት ዘለዎ ኮይኑ፡ ካብ ፕሉቶንየም ጥራይ ዝቐለለ እዩ። ጽቕጥቕጡ ካብቲ ናይ መሪሕነት ብኣስታት 70% ዝዛይድ ኮይኑ፡ ካብቲ ናይ ወርቂ ወይ ታንግስተን ግን ቁሩብ ዝወሓደ እዩ። ኣብ ሓመድ፣ ከውሒን ማይን ካብ ውሑዳት ክፋላት ኣብ ሓደ ሚልዮን ውሑድ ክፋል ብባህርያዊ መንገዲ ዝኽሰት ኮይኑ ካብ ከም ዩራኒናይት ዝኣመሰሉ ዩራንየም ዝሓዙ ማዕድናት ብንግዲ ይውሰድ።
translated_question: ምልክት Uን ኣቶሚክ ቁጽሪ 92ን ዘለዎ ኬሚካላዊ ባእታ እንታይ እዩ?

passage: It is estimated that in 480 BC, 50 million people lived in the Achaemenid Empire. The empire at its peak ruled over 44% of the world's population, the highest such figure for any empire in history. In Greek history, the Achaemenid Empire is considered as the antagonist of the Greek city states, for the emancipation of slaves including the Jewish exiles in Babylon, building infrastructures such as road and postal systems, and the use of an official language, the Imperial Aramaic, throughout its territories. The empire had a centralized, bureaucratic administration under the emperor, a large professional army, and civil services, inspiring similar developments in later empires. Furthermore, one of the Seven Wonders of the Ancient World, the Mausoleum at Halicarnassus, was built in the empire between 353 and 350 BC.
question: How many people lived in the Achaemenid Empire in 480 BC?
translated_passage: ኣብ 480 ቅድሚ ልደተ ክርስቶስ 50 ሚልዮን ሰባት ኣብ ኣካይመኒድ ኢምፓየር ከም ዝነብሩ ይግመት። እቲ ኣብ ዝለዓለ ደረጅኡ ዝነበረ ግዝኣት ልዕሊ 44% ካብ ህዝቢ ዓለም ዝገዝእ ዝነበረ ኮይኑ፡ ኣብ ታሪኽ ንዝኾነ ግዝኣት ዝለዓለ ከምዚ ዝበለ ኣሃዝ እዩ። ኣብ ታሪኽ ግሪኽ፡ ግዝኣት ኣኬሜኒድ ከም ተጻባኢት ከተማ ግሪኽ፡ ንማሕረሽቲ ባሮት ሓዊሱ፡ ኣብ ባቢሎን ዝርከቡ ኣይሁዳውያን ስደተኛታት ሓዊሱ፡ ከም ጽርግያን ፖስታን ስርዓታት ዝሃንጹ ትሕተ-ቅርጺ፡ ከምኡ’ውን ኣጠቓቕማ ወግዓዊ ቋንቋ፡ ሃጸያዊ ኣራማይስታዊ፡ ኣብ መላእ ግዝኣታታ ይቑጸር። እቲ ግዝኣት ኣብ ትሕቲ ሃጸይ ማእከላይን ቢሮክራስያዊን ምምሕዳር ነበሮ፣ ኣብ ድሒሮም ዝመጹ ሃጸይቲ ተመሳሳሊ ምዕባለታት ዘነቓቕሕ ዓቢ ሞያዊ ሰራዊትን ሲቪላዊ ኣገልግሎትን ነበሮ። ካብዚ ሓሊፉ ሓደ ካብቶም ሸውዓተ ተኣምራት ጥንታዊት ዓለም ዝኾነ መቓብር ኣብ ሃሊካርናሱስ ኣብ መንጎ 353ን 350 ቅ.ል.ክ.
translated_question: ክንደይ ሰባት ኣብ ኣካይመኒድ ኢምፓየር ብ480 ቅ.ል.ክ ይነብሩ ነይሮም?
